_comment1: Upon reviewing the comments, all properties beginning with '_comment' should be removed.
_comment2: To obtain the checksum, execute the following command: `cat app-release.apk | openssl dgst -binary -sha256 | openssl base64 | tr '+/' '-_' | tr -d '='`
_comment3: The Wi-Fi extras are optional, and you may omit PROVISIONING_WIFI_SSID, PROVISIONING_WIFI_PASSWORD and PROVISIONING_WIFI_SECURITY_TYPE
